Invocation Name: dance music radio
des:
Underground Dance Music Radio Station

Leeds Dance Community Radio, also known as LDC Radio, will broadcast from a space within the basement of the James Graham building at Leeds Beckett University’s Headingley Campus and feature hip hop, R&B, urban, underground and Northern Soul.

Find more at ldcradio.co.uk
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
